content: What is the difference between Auto Order and manual order?
Auto Order is automatically generated by the system based on predefined criteria, while manual orders are created by users based on their requirements.
Can I modify an Auto Order after it has been generated?
No, Auto Orders cannot be modified once they are generated. However, manual adjustments can be made to the order before submission.
When is an Auto Order generated for Hi10?
Auto Order for Hi10 is generated after the completion of the quarter, provided the customer meets the eligibility criteria.
What happens if the customer does not meet the criteria for Auto Order?
If the customer does not meet the criteria, no Auto Order will be generated. The customer may need to place a manual order.
Is the customer notified when an Auto Order is generated?
Yes, the customer is typically notified once an Auto Order is generated.
Can the Auto Order be canceled?
No, Auto Orders cannot be canceled once they are generated. However, manual adjustments may be possible.
Is Auto Order applicable for all customers?
Auto Order is applicable only to eligible customers who meet the predefined criteria such as the number of visits, shop registration, and GSTN requirements.
How does the system determine eligibility for Auto Order?
Eligibility for Auto Order is determined based on criteria such as the minimum number of visits, shop registration, GSTN status, and approved enrollment status by the Channel Manager.
